lines.content: The information you provide Stripe will help us confirm your identity.
Andrew's Audio will only have access to this verification data.

biometric_consent.privacy_policy: Stripe Privacy Policy • Andrew's Audio Privacy Policy
biometric_consent.title: Continue Document Verification

country_not_listed.address_from_other_country_text_button_t: Have an Address from another country?
country_not_listed.body: The countries not listed are not supported yet. Unfortunately, we cannot verify your identity.
country_not_listed.id_from_other_country_text_button_text: Have an ID from another country?
country_not_listed.title: We cannot verify your identity

lines.content: We leverage Stripe's own verification service to verify your identity through your document and selfie.
lines.title: Stripe technology

lines.content: We also work with trusted partners, including document issuers and authorized record holders, to help us verify your identity.
lines.title: Third party partners

lines.content:
• Passport
  • Drivers license
  • National ID
  • Valid government-issued identification that clearly shows your face
lines.title: Accepted forms of identification

lines.content: Stripe handles billions of dollars in payments annually. The same infrastructure keeps identity verification data safe as well.
lines.title: Your data is encrypted

lines.content: Stripe will use and store your data under Stripe’s privacy policy, including to manage loss and for legal compliance. Learn more.
lines.title: Stripe data use

lines.content: Andrew's Audio will have access to the information you submit and the status of your verification, and may use your information under its privacy policy.
lines.title: Andrew's Audio access

lines.content: You can delete your data by contacting Andrew's Audio.
lines.title: Manage your data

lines.content: You'll provide personal information including name, date of birth, and ID number.
The information you provide Stripe will help us confirm your identity.
Andrew's Audio will only have access to this verification data.

individual_welcome.privacy_policy: Stripe Privacy Policy • Andrew's Audio Privacy Policy
individual_welcome.title: Andrew's Audio works with Stripe to verify your identity

selfie.training_consent_text: Allow Stripe to use your images to improve our biometric verification technology. You can remove Stripe's permissions at any time by contacting Stripe. Learn how Stripe uses data

success.body:
Thank you for providing your information

Rocket Rides will reach out if additional details are required.

Next steps

Rocket Rides will contact regarding the outcome of your identification process.

More about Stripe Identity

Learn how Stripe Identity works

success.title: Verification pending
